# Inline Tags Only Test

This file has NO tags in frontmatter, only inline tags in content.

We use #golang for backend development.
For containers, we rely on #docker and #kubernetes.

Our #microservices architecture uses #docker/container technology.

The #devops team manages #kubernetes/cluster deployments.

Testing nested tags: #nested/deep/tag and #multi-level/very/deep/tag.

Multiple tags on same line: #tag1 #tag2 #tag3 #tag4.

End with #testing tag.
